title: What Do I Do if I Accidentally Slept With Someone Younger - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Devoted Love Interests   Female Protagonist   Modern Day   Younger Love Interests
author: Egg Tart Crust   蛋挞皮
description:
Qiao Li slept with an energetic and passionate boy. She woke up the next day and exchanged her contact information with him with the intention of continuing the relationship.

When she asked about his age, he struggled for a long time and then stammered, “I-I’m already 18.”

! ! !

Qiao Li was so shocked that she instantly slipped away, but the other party was quick to grab her. Feeling wronged, he questioned, “You don’t want me anymore after you’ve taken my virginity?”>
